languages.text: "Темные силы пожирают тебя, Вени'Идира, терзают душу. Я могла бы научить тебя техникам, что очищают разум..."
"Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."
languages.original_text: "Темные силы пожирают тебя, Вени'Идира, терзают душу. Я могла бы научить тебя техникам, что очищают разум..."

traits.locale_text: "Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques that clear the mind..."
"Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques that clear the mind..."
"I see the dark forces devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you some techniques to clear your mind..."
"I see the dark forces devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you some techniques to clear your mind..."
"Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."
"Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."
"Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."

languages.text: "Dunkle Mächte verschlingen Euch und zerren an Eurer Seele, Veni'Idira. Ich könnte Euch Techniken lehren, wie Ihr Euren Verstand beruhigen könnt ..."
languages.original_text: "Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe die dunklen Mächte, die Euch verschlingen, die an Eurer Seele zerren, Veni'Idira. Ich könnte Euch Techniken lehren, wie Ihr Euren Verstand beruhigen könnt ..."

languages.text: « Les forces ténébreuses vous dévorent et tiraillent votre âme, Veni'Idira. Je pourrais vous enseigner des techniques pour faire le vide dans votre esprit... »
languages.original_text: "Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois les forces ténébreuses qui vous dévorent et tiraillent votre âme, Veni'Idira. Je pourrais vous enseigner des techniques pour faire le vide dans votre esprit... »

languages.text: «Fuerzas oscuras la devoran y desgarran su alma, Veni'Idira. Podría enseñarle técnicas para despejar su mente...».
languages.original_text: "Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."

traits.locale_text: «Veo las fuerzas oscuras que la devoran, desgarrando su alma, Veni'Idira. Podría enseñarle técnicas para despejar su mente...».

languages.text: 「闇の力があなたをむしばみ、魂を引き裂いている、ヴェニイディラ。心を澄ませる方法を教えてあげよう…」
languages.original_text: "Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."

traits.locale_text: 「闇の力があなたをむしばみ、魂を引き裂いている、ヴェニイディラ。心を澄ませる方法を教えてあげよう…」

languages.text: “黑暗的力量正在吞噬你，撕裂你的灵魂，帷者伊迪拉。我可以教你一些净化思维的技巧……”
languages.original_text: "Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."

traits.locale_text: “我看到黑暗的力量正在吞噬你，撕裂你的灵魂，帷者伊迪拉。我可以教你一些净化思维的技巧……”

languages.original_text: "Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."

languages.text: "Karanlık güçler seni yiyip bitiriyor, ruhuna saldırıyor Veni'İdira. Sana zihnini netliğe kavuşturma yöntemleri öğretebilirim..."
languages.original_text: "Dark forces are devouring you, tearing at your soul, Veni'Idira. I could teach you techniques to clear your mind..."
